arStrings.szText: Infliggi il {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%x|]{/c} di danni aggiuntivi ai nemici {c_important}{u}raggelati{/u}{/c}. Questo bonus aumenta al {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%x|]{/c} contro i nemici {c_important}{u}congelati{/u}{/c}.

{icon:bullet,1.2} Bonus ai danni da {c_important}{u}raggelamento{/u}{/c} {icon:arrow,1.2} {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%x|]{/c}
{icon:bullet,1.2} Bonus ai danni da {c_important}{u}congelamento{/u}{/c} {icon:arrow,1.2} {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%x|]{/c}
